item.title: Hugo + Cloudfront
item.description: As you can read on my previous blog post, I’ve choosen a set of AWS technologies to back this blog, however here’s the full post on how to set up your own Hugo blog on AWS using CloudFront. Create an example Hugo website You can use this Quickstart to set up your example Hugo website. However, here’s the TL;RD: hugo new site quickstart cd quickstart git init git submodule add https://github.

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Hello internet ðŸ˜„ it’s being a long time since I stopped blogging, however, as I’ve always said, writting is more a necesity than a luxury. Today I’m gonna talk about the tech stack I’m using for blogging, In the past I’ve used Ghost for my previous blog, and a long time ago I also used Joomla!, those are great tools and a lot of technical writters do use Ghost for writting articles, or blogging.
